#summary Which versions of PowerShell is html-template-ps compatible with?

= Compatiblity = 

|| * Version * || * Compatibility * ||
|| 1.0 || Unknown, please send reports ||

= How to find your installed version = 

  # Open PowerShell
  # Type {{{$Host.Version}}}

For example:

== PowerShell 1.0 ==

{{{
PS H:\> $Host.Version

Major  Minor  Build  Revision
-----  -----  -----  --------
1      0      0      0
}}}

== PowerShell 2.0 ==

{{{
PS H:\> $Host.Version

Major  Minor  Build  Revision
-----  -----  -----  --------
2      0      -1      -1
}}}
